name: Shock 'n Drawe
description:
Shocky Bulb Jr. the son of a legendaty electrician, must use his, solar energy reliant, lightning abilities to reconnect the beauty of the world, with his father's blueprints.

Mouse + keyboard:

  • A+D keys to move.
  • Left click to hang from blue electric poles.
  • Space to release.
  • Space to launch from batteries.
  • Right click to propell form yellow balls within range.

Xbox Controller:

  • Left joystick to move
  • RB (Hold) to hang.
  • RB (Release) to drop.
  • A to proppel, launch.
